title: #55 POP Dive: My Best Friend's Wedding
itunes:title: #55 POP Dive: My Best Friend's Wedding
itunes:subtitle: In this Everything Iconic POP Dive, Danny & his BFF Jillian Corbets deep dive into 1997's My Best Friend's Wedding. Julia Roberts & Dermot Mulroney will reunite this fall for the 3rd time on Amazon's "Homecoming," but w...
description:
In this Everything Iconic POP Dive, Danny & his BFF Jillian Corbets deep dive into 1997's My Best Friend's Wedding. Julia Roberts & Dermot Mulroney will reunite this fall for the 3rd time on Amazon's "Homecoming," but we take a look back at their iconic first onscreen pairing alongside Cameron Diaz & Rupert Everett. Jessica Green (host of "The Big Day - Real Talk About Real Weddings" podcast) also stops by for a wedding-themed lightning round.


*For bonus episodes & to support Everything Iconic, go to Patreon.com/EverythingIconic.

Links:
